com.camerontec.util.jmx

Interface IMBeanInfoCompression

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MBeanInfoCompressionClientWrapper, MBeanInfoCompressionServerWrapper
    Deprecated. 
    MBeanInfo compression is now deprecated and is replaced by MBeanInfo batching performed by the cascading agent. Support for MBeanInfo compression is retained for backwards compatibility with previous versions of the LMA Connector, LMA or MIS which do not have support for MBeanInfo batching

    @Deprecated
public interface IMBeanInfoCompression
    Superclass of the client and server wrapper classes used to perform MBeanInfo compression.

    MBeanInfo compression is a mechanism used to speed up the exchange of MBean info over a slow network connection. Here is how MBeanInfo is exchanged between two MBeanServerConnection wrappers, respectively in client and server modes:
    • The client issues a remote getMBeanInfo(objectName) call on the server with a modified object name that has a specific prefix in its domain indicating that compressed MBeanInfo should be returned.
    • The server retrieves the MBeanInfo but does not return it. Instead, it returns a new empty MBean info with a descriptor key containing the hash of the original MBeanInfo.
    • Assuming the server is not compatible with MBeanInfo compression, it would cause an InstanceNotFoundException at this stage, which would be caught by the client, which would then simply request the MBeanInfo again using a regular getMBeanInfo(objectName) call, using a non-modified object name.
    • The client receives this empty MBeanInfo and uses the hash value in its descriptor key to look up the complete MBeanInfo in a local cache.
    • If the cache contains an entry, this MBeanInfo is used.
    • Otherwise, the client issues another getMBeanInfo(objectName) call on the server with a modified object name that has a prefix in its domain indicating that uncompressed MBeanInfo should be returned.
    • The server retrieves the MBeanInfo and returns it, with an extra descriptor key containing the MBeanInfo's hash code. This is to avoid issues due to diverging hash-code computations between the client and the server.
    • The client receives the MBeanInfo and stores it in its cache.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COMPRESSED_HASHCODE_DESCRIPTOR_KEY
      Deprecated. 
      The descriptor key in compressed MBeanInfo instances.
      static String COMPRESSED_MBEAN_INFO_PREFIX
      Deprecated. 
      The domain prefix used by the client to request a compressed MBeanInfo.
      static String UNCOMPRESSED_HASHCODE_DESCRIPTOR_KEY
      Deprecated. 
      The descriptor key in uncompressed MBeanInfo instances.
      static String UNCOMPRESSED_MBEAN_INFO_PREFIX
      Deprecated. 
      The domain prefix used by the client to request an uncompressed MBeanInfo.
